column4: Characters (list all involved, any order, separated by comma)

column5: [Arg] "Did you sleep at all last night? *sit* I couldn’t sleep a fuckin’ wink." (5sec) [Kall] "Not less than usual." (3sec) [Arg] "I bet it was those mushrooms that hermit made us eat last night… I knew they looked funny.  What was he doin’ picking those up last night anyways?" (9sec) [Kall] "hm." (2sec) [Arg]  "I bet they were poisonous.  If I end up dyin’ tonight, you know whose fault it is." (5sec) [Kall] "What happens, happens..." (4sec)

[Lura] "Hey, I got some great news!  I read the signs last night, and today’s travels should be safe!" (6sec) [Snäll] "Well that’s good to hear!  What were the signs this time?" (4sec) [Lura] "I saw a raven flying away from the graves we made last night, so their souls should be protecting us today!" (6sec) [Snäll] "I’m sure Tyst will appreciate the help." (4sec) [Lura] "What do you think's on the other side of the forest?" (4sec) [Snäll] "…" (3sec) [Lura] "… I asked Kall and all they said was somewhere else." (6sec) [Snäll] "*chuckles* Somewhere better than here, I trust Tyst." (5sec) [Lura] "It will be." (4sec)

column1: Snäll and Kall talking about the attack
column5: [Snäll] "...Hey." [Kall] "…" [Snäll] "Been a while since we last talked." [Kall] "Yeah." [Snäll] "Before it all happened, I think." [Kall] "The rain of silent death." [Snäll] "How’ve you been taking it?" [Kall] "Dunno...  How about you?  You lost some pretty important things back there." [Snäll] "…" [Kall] "Like that music box you kept insisting on playing.  Couldn’t stand that as a kid." [Snäll] "*chuckles* You saying you like it now?" [Kall] "…" [Kall] "No.  But at least it’d be something."
